aboutMe.title: Let's work together
aboutMe.description: I am a software engineer based in East Brandenburg, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my Engineer career with a job in a junior software engineering position.
aboutMe.recency: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

contact.title: Contact
contact.descriptionText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

privacyPolicy.last: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

Join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

Sharkie.description: Swim and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the Orca.

Pokédex.description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemons information.

myWork.title: My work
myWork.titleDescription: Feel free to try out my latest web development projects and look into their code.
